name: Decision
description:
Click here to view the news article this game is based on - David Cameron defends Jeremy Hunt's handling of BSkyB bid

This is from the version 2.0/3.0 era of ANGELINA, where it made Metroidvania-style platformers and themed them around news stories. 

This game was made by ANGELINA, an AI research project, back in 2012. For more information about the project, you can visit the project website!
